players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm clean, ask Diana about me"
You: "Asking Diana about Bob's role, looking for clues."
Diana: "Investigated Bob, found him to be the mafioso. Alice, you might want to watch him."
Bob: "I'm not mafia, Diana confirmed. Watch out for Alice."
Diana: "Bob confirmed not mafia, watch Alice closely."
You: "Thanks Diana, keeping an eye on Alice and Bob. Any votes?"

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm clean, ask Diana about me"
Alice: "Asking Diana about Bob's role, looking for clues."
Diana: "Investigated Bob, found him to be the mafioso. Alice, you might want to watch him."
You: "I'm not mafia, Diana confirmed. Watch out for Alice."
Diana: "Bob confirmed not mafia, watch Alice closely."
Alice: "Thanks Diana, keeping an eye on Alice and Bob. Any votes?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested

Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Asking Diana about Bob's role, looking for clues."
You: "Investigated Bob, found him to be the mafioso. Alice, you might want to watch him."
Bob: "I'm not mafia, Diana confirmed. Watch out for Alice."
You: "Bob confirmed not mafia, watch Alice closely."
Alice: "Thanks Diana, keeping an eye on Alice and Bob. Any votes?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
